comment: (здесь нужно вписать место в соответствии с ЛД)!!!

languages.text:
"Джервас, да охранит тебя милостью своей Бессмертный Император!
Я сделал все, что было в моих силах. Хватай Анжетт и Джоленту и как можно скорее беги с этого проклятого мира! Проездную грамоту и некоторые сбережения я оставил в нашем тайнике у Шпиля Гордости, под одним из розыскных плакатов. Да благословит Повелитель Человечества Актикуса за помощь. У меня остались дела в департаменте, так что встретимся уже на Футфоле.
С любовью, твой брат Лампречт фон Гроттен".

languages.text:
"Jervas, may the Immortal Emperor guard you with His grace!
I have done everything I possibly could. Grab Angette and Jolanta and flee this cursed world as soon as possible! I left the writ of passage and some savings in our secret cache at the Spire of Pride under one of the wanted posters. May the Master of Mankind bless Acticus for his assistance. I still have unfinished business at the department, so we will reunite on Footfall.
Your loving brother, Lamprecht von Grotten"

languages.text:
“杰瓦斯，愿不朽神皇赐予你祂的恩典！
我已经做了一切我能做的事情。赶紧带上安吉特和约兰塔，逃出这个被诅咒的世界！我把通行令状和一部分积蓄藏在了荣耀尖塔的秘密藏匿处，就藏在某张通缉令下面。阿提库斯帮了我们这个忙，愿人类之主保佑他。我在部门里还有没做完的事情，咱们去落脚港团聚吧。
你亲爱的兄弟，兰普瑞特·冯·格罗滕”
languages.original_text:
"Jervas, may the Immortal Emperor guard you with His grace!

Your loving brother, Lamprecht von Grotten"

languages.text:
«¡Jervas, que el Emperador inmortal te guarde con su gracia!
He hecho absolutamente todo lo que he podido. ¡Coge a Angette y Jolanta y huid de este mundo maldito de inmediato! He dejado el salvoconducto y algo de dinero en nuestro escondite secreto en la Aguja del Orgullo, bajo uno de los carteles de se busca. Que el Señor de la Humanidad bendiga a Acticus por su ayuda. Aún tengo cosas que hacer en el departamento; nos veremos en Paso.
Un abrazo de tu hermano, Lamprecht von Grotten».
languages.original_text:
"Jervas, may the Immortal Emperor guard you with His grace!

Un abrazo de tu hermano, Lamprecht von Grotten».

languages.text:
「ジャーバス、不死の皇帝による加護と慈悲が君にあらんことを！
おそらく、私はできる限りのことは全部やった。アンジェットとヨランタを捕まえて、この呪われた星から一刻も早く逃げるんだ！航行令状と金をいくらか、ある指名手配書の下にある、誇りの尖塔の隠し場所に残しておいた。人類の盟主はアクティカスを助けてくださる。私はまだこの地域で終わってない仕事がある。フットフォールで落ち合おう。
愛する兄弟、ランプレヒト・フォン・グロッテン」
languages.original_text:
"Jervas, may the Immortal Emperor guard you with His grace!
I have done everything I possibly could. Grab Angette and Jolanta and flee this cursed world as soon as possible! I left the writ of passage and some savings in our secret cache at the Spire of Pride under one of the wanted posters. May the Master of Mankind bless Acticus for his assistance. I still have unfinished business at the department, so we will reunite on Footfall.
Your loving brother, Lamprecht von Grotten"

愛する兄弟、ランプレヒト・フォン・グロッテン」

languages.text:
« Jervas, que l'Empereur immortel te protège de sa grâce !
J'ai fait tout ce je pouvais. Emmène Angette et Jolanta, et fuyez ce monde maudit dès que possible ! J'ai laissé le laissez-passer et quelques économies dans notre cache secrète à la Tour de la Fierté, sous l'un des avis de recherche. Puisse le Maître de l'Humanité bénir Acticus pour son aide. Il me reste encore à faire au département, je vous retrouverai donc à Castel.
Ton frère qui t'aime, Lamprecht von Grotten »
languages.original_text:
"Jervas, may the Immortal Emperor guard you with His grace!
I have done everything I possibly could. Grab Angette and Jolanta and flee this cursed world as soon as possible! I left the writ of passage and some savings in our secret cache at the Spire of Pride under one of the wanted posters. May the Master of Mankind bless Acticus for his assistance. I still have unfinished business at the department, so we will reunite on Footfall.
Your loving brother, Lamprecht von Grotten"

languages.text:
"Jervas, möge der unsterbliche Imperator Euch mit seiner Gunst beschützen!
Ich habe alles getan, was ich konnte. Nehmt Angette und Jolanta und flieht so schnell wie möglich von dieser verfluchten Welt! Ich habe die Durchreisegenehmigung und etwas Erspartes in unserem Geheimlager am Turm des Stolzes versteckt, unter einem der Steckbriefe. Der Herr der Menschheit segne Acticus für seine Unterstützung. Ich habe noch einige Dinge in der Abteilung zu erledigen, wir treffen uns also auf Footfall wieder.
Euer liebender Bruder, Lamprecht von Grotten"
languages.original_text:
"Jervas, may the Immortal Emperor guard you with His grace!

Your loving brother, Lamprecht von Grotten"

languages.text:
"Ölümsüz İmparator seni lütfuyla korusun Jervas!
Elimden gelen her şeyi yaptım. Angette ve Jolanta'yı alıp en kısa sürede bu lanetli dünyadan ayrıl! Gurur Kulesi'ndeki aranıyor afişlerinden birinin altındaki gizli zulamıza geçiş izniyle bir miktar para sakladım. İnsanlığın Efendisi, yardımları için Acticus'u kutsasın. Departmanda yapmam gereken birkaç iş daha var, Binliman'da görüşürüz.
Seni seven kardeşin Lamprecht von Grotten"
languages.original_text:
"Jervas, may the Immortal Emperor guard you with His grace!
I have done everything I possibly could. Grab Angette and Jolanta and flee this cursed world as soon as possible! I left the writ of passage and some savings in our secret cache at the Spire of Pride under one of the wanted posters. May the Master of Mankind bless Acticus for his assistance. I still have unfinished business at the department, so we will reunite on Footfall.
Your loving brother, Lamprecht von Grotten"

traits.locale_text:
"Ölümsüz İmparator seni lütfuyla korusun Jervas!
Elimden gelen her şeyi yaptım. Angette ve Jolanta'yı alıp en kısa sürede bu lanetli dünyadan ayrıl! Geçiş iznini ve biraz parayı Gurur Kulesi'nde aranan afişlerinden birinin altındaki gizli zulamıza sakladım. İnsanlığın Efendisi, Acticus'u yardımları için kutsasın. Departmanda yapmam gereken birkaç iş daha var, Binliman'da görüşürüz.
Seni seven kardeşin Lamprecht von Grotten"
